rule.name: Disallow Tab Indent
rule.description: Spaces must be used to indent lines; tabs are not allowed

rule.name: Closing Tag
rule.description: A closing tag is not permitted at the end of a PHP file

rule.name: Function Comment
rule.description: You must use "/**" style comments for a function comment

rule.name: Lower Case Constant
rule.description: TRUE, FALSE and NULL must be lowercase; expected "null" but found "NULL"
